definition: to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
same as 逶 in 逶迤 winding, curved
to entrust/to cast aside/to shift (blame etc)/to accumulate/roundabout/winding/dejected/listless/committee member/council/end/actually/certainly

sentences.english: Governor of Hunan Province Mei Kebao also attended the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 省委副书记梅克保参加会见。

sentences.english: PS Wang meeting: Ambassador Huntsman called on Party Secretary Wang Yang and Mayor Wan at Zhudao this morning.
sentences.chinese: 大使今晨在珠岛宾馆与省委书记汪洋及万市长会面。

sentences.english: The main leaders of the Party Committee in Jiangxi province proposed that Xinyu take the lead to realize the city and countryside integration.
sentences.chinese: 省委主要领导要求新余在全省率先实现城乡一体化。

sentences.english: Mao linsheng was appointed member of the Standing Committee of CPC Zhejiang Provincial Committee.
sentences.chinese: 任命茅临生为中共浙江省委常委。

sentences.english: After the meeting, by the Hunan Provincial Party Committee Secretary Zhang Chunxian reporters, "containment."
sentences.chinese: 会后，湖南省委书记张春贤受到记者的“围堵”。

sentences.english: Be named to be by round provincial Party committee recently " Yunnan saves expert of first youth station " .
sentences.chinese: 最近被团省委命名为“云南省首届青年岗位能手”。

sentences.english: The report is said to have caused the Guangdong Provincial Party Committee and provincial government attention.
sentences.chinese: 该报告说，已造成广东省委，省政府的关注。

sentences.english: Zhao Hongzhu, provincial Party committee secretaries of Zhejiang, and Board chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 浙江省委书记赵洪祝与郑元豹董事长。

sentences.english: Liu Qibao, secretary of Sichuan Province Party Committee and Board Chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 中共四川省委书记刘奇葆与郑元豹董事长亲切交谈。

sentences.english: The party has also urged that the city's legislature vote to strip him from his mayoral post.
sentences.chinese: 中共山西省委还督促市人大投票解除他的市长职务。

sentences.english: Deputy Secretary of the Hunan Provincial CPC Committee Mei Kebao made an important speech at the celebration meeting.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省委副书记梅克保在会上发表重要讲话。

sentences.english: Zhou Qiang, secretary of the CPC Hunan Provincial Committee, delivers a speech at the closing ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中共湖南省委书记周强在闭幕式上发表讲话。

sentences.english: Xu Guangchun-the current secretary of Henan Provincial Party Committee and the Chairman-Zheng Yuanbao.
sentences.chinese: 原河南省委书记徐光春与郑元豹董事长。

sentences.english: He graduated from Hunan Provincial Party College in 1992.
sentences.chinese: 1992年于湖南省委党校大学专科毕业。

sentences.english: Mei Kebao, vice secretary of the Hunan Provincial CPC Committee attended the closing ceremony and delivered a speech.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省委副书记梅克保出席闭幕式并讲话。

sentences.english: Four provincial governors and one provincial party secretary recently were charged with corruption.
sentences.chinese: 最近有几名省长和省委书记被控腐败。

definition: secretary (chief official of a branch of a socialist or communist party)/clerk/scribe
head of provincial PRC government department
